metadata.title: CVE-2019-9074 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (akalibbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.32. It is an out-of-bounds readleading to a SEGV in bfd_getl32 in libbfd.c, when called frompex64_get_runtime_function in pei-x86_64.c.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
